text: Ongoing through December 13th: Discovery, Collection, Memory: The @orientalinst at 💯 in the SCRC gallery: https://t.co/TjHl28oUt0 https://t.co/fZxw0RV5Y1
Stop by our gallery, too, and check out an exhibition on the 100th anniversary of @orientalinst! https://t.co/3xKXdDmXsG https://t.co/gIvk5wEeT1

Our new exhibit, Discovery, Collection, Memory: The Oriental Institute at 100 opens today! The exhibit explores one century of excavation, research, and scholarship, focusing on the geographical areas of #Egypt, #Iran, #Iraq, #Turkey, and #Afghanistan. https://t.co/lys6Wjgvps https://t.co/4SJ2H8SpW5
Read this wonderful article, then check out our exhibit "Discovery, Collection, Memory: The Oriental Institute at 100" starting Monday, September 16th! https://t.co/wD6mfjj6mQ
